results.content: I don't understand why the requirements for this course was not properly set. After watching the course intro and the final promo video (both listed on the top) I felt very discouraged and didn't understand most of the things the instructor was saying.

response.content: Hi Annie sorry for this yes its built with a linux in mind because the services used work the best on this platform and expects it does expect some familiarity with the technologies used. There is a facebook group where there are people willing to help if in need for any assistance in an area you may get stuck at in the future. Im always willing to help step someone through things.
